General.Name: The INX Digital Company Inc.
General.Description: The INX Digital Company, Inc. operates trading platform for cryptocurrencies and digital securities. The company's platform allows users to trade in digital blockchain assets, such as cryptocurrencies and security tokens. The company was incorporated in 2017 and is headquartered in Herzelia, Israel.

9.Name: Mr. Vladislav  Uchenik
9.Title: CEO & Chief Compliance Officer at INX Securities
